message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it's a great deal for you considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $135. I believe this product will truly benefit you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
